title: Aggregate across time — aggregate
code: aggregate(data, var, scale, ..., id = NULL, index = NULL, na.rm = TRUE)

title: Aggregate across time — aggregate
text: data data frame var variable aggregate along scale time scale aggregate ... ignore id site identifier index temporal identifier na.rm logical, whether remove pending NAs aggregated

title: Aggregate across time — aggregate
text: data frame variable specified aggregated scale

title: Aggregate across time — aggregate
code: # first 11 NA rows are removed unless specified through na.rm = FALSE tenterfield %>%   init(id = id, time = ym, indicators = prcp:tavg) %>%   aggregate(var = prcp, scale = 12) #> Removing the pending NAs due to aggregation #> $data #> # A tibble: 358 × 8 #>    id                ym  prcp  tmax   tmin  tavg  .agg .scale #>    <chr>          <mth> <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl> #>  1 ASN00056032 1990 Dec   640  30.4 14.7   22.6   8382     12 #>  2 ASN00056032 1991 Jan  1108  27.5 15.9   21.7   8608     12 #>  3 ASN00056032 1991 Feb   628  28.0 15.5   21.8   7976     12 #>  4 ASN00056032 1991 Mar   204  26.2 11.8   19.0   7926     12 #>  5 ASN00056032 1991 Apr    44  24.2  6.57  15.4   6376     12 #>  6 ASN00056032 1991 May   630  21.3  7.52  14.4   5786     12 #>  7 ASN00056032 1991 Jun   242  19.6  3.65  11.6   5634     12 #>  8 ASN00056032 1991 Jul   580  15.3  0.519  7.91  5596     12 #>  9 ASN00056032 1991 Aug    14  17.8  1.67   9.76  5276     12 #> 10 ASN00056032 1991 Sep    78  21.1  3.07  12.1   5088     12 #> # … with 348 more rows #>  #> $roles #> # A tibble: 6 × 2 #>   variables roles      #>   <chr>     <chr>      #> 1 id        id         #> 2 ym        time       #> 3 prcp      indicators #> 4 tmax      indicators #> 5 tmin      indicators #> 6 tavg      indicators #>  #> $op #>     module      step  var  args val  res #> 1 temporal aggregate prcp scale  12 .agg #>  #> attr(,"class") #> [1] "indri" "list"   # with multiple scales tenterfield %>%   init(id = id, time = ym, indicators = prcp:tavg) %>%   aggregate(var = prcp, scale = c(12, 24)) #> Removing the pending NAs due to aggregation #> $data #> # A tibble: 704 × 8 #>    id                ym  prcp  tmax   tmin  tavg .scale  .agg #>    <chr>          <mth> <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl> #>  1 ASN00056032 1990 Dec   640  30.4 14.7   22.6      12  8382 #>  2 ASN00056032 1991 Jan  1108  27.5 15.9   21.7      12  8608 #>  3 ASN00056032 1991 Feb   628  28.0 15.5   21.8      12  7976 #>  4 ASN00056032 1991 Mar   204  26.2 11.8   19.0      12  7926 #>  5 ASN00056032 1991 Apr    44  24.2  6.57  15.4      12  6376 #>  6 ASN00056032 1991 May   630  21.3  7.52  14.4      12  5786 #>  7 ASN00056032 1991 Jun   242  19.6  3.65  11.6      12  5634 #>  8 ASN00056032 1991 Jul   580  15.3  0.519  7.91     12  5596 #>  9 ASN00056032 1991 Aug    14  17.8  1.67   9.76     12  5276 #> 10 ASN00056032 1991 Sep    78  21.1  3.07  12.1      12  5088 #> # … with 694 more rows #>  #> $roles #> # A tibble: 6 × 2 #>   variables roles      #>   <chr>     <chr>      #> 1 id        id         #> 2 ym        time       #> 3 prcp      indicators #> 4 tmax      indicators #> 5 tmin      indicators #> 6 tavg      indicators #>  #> $op #>     module      step  var  args val  res #> 1 temporal aggregate prcp scale  12 .agg #> 2 temporal aggregate prcp scale  24 .agg #>  #> attr(,"class") #> [1] "indri" "list"

title: Title — augment
code: augment(data, id = id, date = date, var = var, gamma_adjust = TRUE)

title: Title — augment
text: data data id id date date var col gamma_adjust gamma_adjust

title: Calculating PET — calc_pet
text: data data method method calculate PET id site identifier ... variable use

title: Calculating PET — calc_pet
code: if (require(SPEI, quietly = TRUE)){ tenterfield %>%   init(id = id, time = ym, indicators = prcp:tavg) %>%   calc_pet(method = "thornthwaite", id = id, Tave = tavg, lat = -29.0479) } #> # Package SPEI (1.7) loaded [try SPEINews()]. #> $data #> # A tibble: 369 × 7 #>    id                ym  prcp  tmax  tmin  tavg   pet #>    <chr>          <mth> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> #>  1 ASN00056032 1990 Jan   882  27.0 15.2  21.1  112.  #>  2 ASN00056032 1990 Feb  1260  26.1 16.0  21.0   96.9 #>  3 ASN00056032 1990 Mar   254  23.8 13.4  18.6   83.7 #>  4 ASN00056032 1990 Apr  1594  20.4 12.5  16.5   62.7 #>  5 ASN00056032 1990 May  1220  19.1  6.66 12.9   42.2 #>  6 ASN00056032 1990 Jun   394  14.6  3.19  8.88  22.7 #>  7 ASN00056032 1990 Jul   618  15.5  1.95  8.75  23.3 #>  8 ASN00056032 1990 Aug   334  14.3  2.49  8.41  23.2 #>  9 ASN00056032 1990 Sep   266  18.7  5.4  12.1   41.3 #> 10 ASN00056032 1990 Oct   362  23.3  7.6  15.4   66.2 #> # … with 359 more rows #>  #> $roles #> # A tibble: 6 × 2 #>   variables roles      #>   <chr>     <chr>      #> 1 id        id         #> 2 ym        time       #> 3 prcp      indicators #> 4 tmax      indicators #> 5 tmin      indicators #> 6 tavg      indicators #>  #> $op #>      module         step  var args      val res #> 1 var trans thornthwaite tavg  lat -29.0479 pet #>  #> attr(,"class") #> [1] "indri" "list"

title: Dimension reduction — dim_red
text: data data expr expression evaluate new_name new name

what: indri: What the Package Does (Title Case) — indri-package
title: indri: What the Package Does (Title Case) — indri-package
text: (maybe one line) Use four spaces indenting paragraphs within Description.

title: Title — normalise
code: normalise(   data,   dist,   gran = "month",   date,   id,   var,   n_boot = 1,   boot_seed = 123,   method = "lmoms",   gamma_adjust = TRUE )

title: Title — normalise
text: data data frame dist distributions gran granularity date date id id var var n_boot number bootstrap samples, default 1 boot_seed seed bootstrap sampling method fitting methods, one lmoms (L-moment), mle (Maximum Likelihood), mom (Method moment) gamma_adjust adjustment gamma, add reference

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: lhs value magrittr placeholder. rhs function call using magrittr semantics.

title: Rescaling functions — rsc_zscore
code: rsc_zscore(var, na.rm = TRUE)  rsc_minmax(var, na.rm = TRUE)

title: Rescaling functions — rsc_zscore
text: var variable na.rm logical; whether remove NAs

what: Precipitation in the Tenterfield station from 1990 to 2020 — tenterfield
title: Precipitation in the Tenterfield station from 1990 to 2020 — tenterfield
Precipitation in the Tenterfield station from 1990 to 2020 — tenterfield
Precipitation in the Tenterfield station from 1990 to 2020 — tenterfield
text: tibble three columns: id station ID, corresponds tenterfied station ym date yearmonth prcp summed monthly precipitation daily data

title: Title — theme_benchmark
code: if (require("ggplot2", quietly = TRUE) ){ data.frame(x = 1:100, y = rnorm(100, sd = 2)) %>%   ggplot(aes(x = x, y =y )) +   geom_line() +   theme_benchmark() }
